text: aur agar tum safar mein ho aur koee likhane vaala na mile (aur qarz dena ho) to rahan ya kabza rakh lo aur agar tumamen ek ka ek ko etabaar ho to (yoon hee qarz de sakata hai magar) phir jis shakhs par etabaar kiya gaya hai (qarz lene vaala) usako chaahiye qarz dene vaale kee amaanat (qarz) pooree pooree ada kar de aur apane paalane vaale khuda se dare (musalamaano) tum gavaahee ko na chhipao aur jo chhipaega to beshak usaka dil gunaahagaar hai aur tum log jo kuchh karate ho khuda usako khoob jaanata hai
